subject: College Athletics
NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: The Red Storm is 3-0 in the Big East after beating Georgetown on Monday, recalling the days before the league was bloated and St. John’s was a force in college basketball, if not a true powerhouse.
snippet: The Red Storm is 3-0 in the Big East after beating Georgetown on Monday, recalling the days before the league was bloated and St. John’s was a force in college basketball, if not a true powerhouse.
